耳翼: (みみつばさ) - {anat} pinna (of the ear); auricle
耳聡い: (みみざとい) - sharp-eared; have sharp ears; picks things up fast
耳茸: (みみたけ) - ear polyp; aural polyp
耳落: (みみおち) - removing edges; cutting edges
耳触り: (みみざわり) - (not to be confused with 耳障り) feeling one gets from listening to something
耳許: (みみもと) - (usu. 耳元で) close to the ear; into someone's ear
耳貝: (ミミガイ) - ass's ear abalone (Haliotis asinina); donkey's ear abalone
耳遠い: (みみどおい) - hard of hearing; unfamiliar
耳釣り: (みみつり) - "ear-hanging" scallop spat, i.e. piercing the resilium to string them
耳障り: (mimizawari) - hard (nos ouvidos), offensive (to the ear), rasping, rough, harsh, grating, jarring, cacophonous
耳隠し: (みみかくし) - hairdo covering the ears
耳馴れる: (みみなれる) - to be something familiar
耳鼻咽喉: (じびいんこう) - ear; nose; and throat
耳鼻咽喉専門医: (じびいんこうせんもんい) - ear, nose and throat specialist
耳鼻咽喉科: (jibiinkouka) - otorrinolaringologia, departamento de otorrinolaringologia, ouvido, nariz e garganta
耳鼻科: (じびか) - otolaryngology; concerning the ear, nose, and throat
耶蘇会: (やそかい) - Society of Jesus; Jesuits
耶馬台国: (やばたいこく) - Yamataikoku; historical Japanese state thought to have existed during the late Yayoi period
耽ける: (ふける) - to indulge in/to give oneself up to/to be obsessed by; to be engrossed in/to be lost in/to be absorbed in
耽る: (ふける) - to indulge in/to give oneself up to/to be obsessed by; to be engrossed in/to be lost in/to be absorbed in
耽楽: (たんらく) - indulging in pleasure; giving oneself up to enjoyment
耽溺: (tandeki) - indulgence (por exemplo, em álcool, mulheres, etc.); debauchery, dissipation
耽溺生活: (たんできせいかつ) - (yoji) a fast (dissolute) life; a life of follies; a life given to dissolute pleasures
聆し: (とし) - (adj-ku)   (esp. 利し, 鋭し) sharp; (esp. 疾し, 鋭し) intense/strong/powerful; (esp. 疾し, 捷し) quick/rapid/fast; (esp. 敏し, 聆し) keen/sharp/clever
聊か: (いささか) - a little; a bit; somewhat
聖: (sei) - santo, Santa, St.; sagrado, santo, puro
聖の御代: (ひじりのみよ) - highly-esteemed emperor's reign
聖エルモの火: (せいエルモのひ) - St Elmo's fire
聖人: (せいじん) - saint; sage; holy man
聖人君子: (せいじんくんし) - (yoji) person of lofty virtue; man of noble character; perfect person; saint
聖人賢者: (せいじんけんじゃ) - (yoji) person of lofty virtue and great wisdom
聖体: (せいたい) - the emperor's person; the body of Christ/the Host/the Eucharist/Holy Communion
聖体拝領: (せいたいはいりょう) - Eucharist (in Catholicism); Holy Communion
聖公会: (せいこうかい) - Anglican or Episcopal Church
聖典: (せいてん) - scriptures/sacred book/holy book/holy writings; writings of a sage/sage's memoir
聖剣: (せいけん) - holy sword; sacred sword
聖名祝日: (せいめいしゅくじつ) - one's saint's day; name day
聖地: (せいち) - sacred place; holy ground; the Holy Land
聖域: (せいいき) - sacred precincts/sanctuary/consecrated ground/holy ground; issue that is regarded as being off-limits/matter that is not up for discussion
聖天: (しょうでん) - Nandikesvara (Ganesh in the Buddhist pantheon)
聖寿: (せいじゅ) - age or life of the emperor
聖徳: (せいとく) - imperial virtue/heavenly virtue; greatest virtue/highest virtue
聖恩: (せいおん) - imperial blessings or favor (favour)
聖教: (せいきょう) - sacred teachings; Confucianism; Christianity
聖日: (せいじつ) - holy day; the Sabbath
